entity.name: publication
entity.query: SELECT pv.id, pv.publication_type_id, pt.code as publication_type_code, publ.id as pubid, pv.pubyear, pv.title, pv.sourcetitle, pv.sourcevolume, pv.sourceissue, pv.sourcepages, pv.place, pv.publisher, pv.dissdate, pv.dissopponent, pv.isbn, pv.issn, pv.patent_applicant, pv.patent_application_number, pv.patent_application_date, pv.patent_number, pv.patent_date, pv.keywords, pv.abstract, pv.publanguage as language, publ.created_at as created, publ.updated_at as modified, CASE pt.code WHEN 'conference_other' THEN 'Conference contribution' WHEN 'conference_paper' THEN 'Conference paper' WHEN 'conference_poster' THEN 'Poster' WHEN 'publication_journal-article' THEN 'Journal article' WHEN 'publication_magazine-article' THEN 'Magazine article' WHEN 'publication_edited-book' THEN 'Edited book' WHEN 'publication_book' THEN 'Book' WHEN 'publication_book-chapter' THEN 'Chapter in book' WHEN 'intellectual-property_patent' THEN 'Patent' WHEN 'publication_report' THEN 'Report' WHEN 'publication_doctoral-thesis' THEN 'Doctoral thesis' WHEN 'publication_book-review' THEN 'Book review' WHEN 'publication_licentiate-thesis' THEN 'Licentiate thesis' WHEN 'other' THEN 'Other' WHEN 'publication_review-article' THEN 'Review article' WHEN 'artistic-work_scientific_and_development' THEN 'Artistic research and development' WHEN 'publication_textcritical-edition' THEN 'Text critical edition' WHEN 'publication_textbook' THEN 'Textbook' WHEN 'artistic-work_original-creative-work' THEN 'Artwork' WHEN 'publication_editorial-letter' THEN 'Editorial letter' WHEN 'publication_report-chapter' THEN 'Report chapter' WHEN 'publication_newspaper-article' THEN 'Newspaper article' WHEN 'publication_encyclopedia-entry' THEN 'Encyclopedia entry' WHEN 'publication_journal-issue' THEN 'Journal issue' WHEN 'conference_proceeding' THEN 'Proceeding' WHEN 'publication_working-paper' THEN 'Working paper' END as pubtype_en, CASE pt.code WHEN 'conference_other' THEN 'Konferensbidrag (offentliggjort, men ej förlagsutgivet)' WHEN 'conference_paper' THEN 'Paper i proceeding' WHEN 'conference_poster' THEN 'Poster (konferens)' WHEN 'publication_journal-article' THEN 'Artikel i vetenskaplig tidskrift' WHEN 'publication_magazine-article' THEN 'Artikel i övriga tidskrifter' WHEN 'publication_edited-book' THEN 'Samlingsverk' WHEN 'publication_book' THEN 'Bok' WHEN 'publication_book-chapter' THEN 'Kapitel i bok' WHEN 'intellectual-property_patent' THEN 'Patent' WHEN 'publication_report' THEN 'Rapport' WHEN 'publication_doctoral-thesis' THEN 'Doktorsavhandling' WHEN 'publication_book-review' THEN 'Recension' WHEN 'publication_licentiate-thesis' THEN 'Licentiatsavhandling' WHEN 'other' THEN 'Övrigt' WHEN 'publication_review-article' THEN 'Forskningsöversiktsartikel' WHEN 'artistic-work_scientific_and_development' THEN 'Konstnärligt forsknings- och utvecklingsarbete' WHEN 'publication_textcritical-edition' THEN 'Textkritisk utgåva' WHEN 'publication_textbook' THEN 'Lärobok' WHEN 'artistic-work_original-creative-work' THEN 'Konstnärligt arbete' WHEN 'publication_editorial-letter' THEN 'Inledande text i tidskrift' WHEN 'publication_report-chapter' THEN 'Kapitel i rapport' WHEN 'publication_newspaper-article' THEN 'Artikel i dagstidning' WHEN 'publication_encyclopedia-entry' THEN 'Bidrag till encyklopedi' WHEN 'publication_journal-issue' THEN 'Special / temanummer av tidskrift' WHEN 'conference_proceeding' THEN 'Proceeding' WHEN 'publication_working-paper' THEN 'Working paper' END as pubtype_sv FROM publication_versions pv JOIN publications publ ON publ.current_version_id = pv.id JOIN publication_types pt ON pt.id = pv.publication_type_id WHERE publ.deleted_at IS NULL AND publ.published_at IS NOT NULL

entity.name: people
entity.query: SELECT p.id AS person_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, i.value AS person_extid, p2p.position, CASE pt.code WHEN 'publication_edited-book' THEN 2 WHEN 'publication_textcritical-edition' THEN 2 WHEN 'publication_journal-issue' THEN 2 WHEN 'conference_proceeding' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as person_role_id, CASE pt.code WHEN 'publication_edited-book' THEN 'Editor' WHEN 'publication_journal-issue' THEN 'Editor' WHEN 'publication_textcritical-edition' THEN 'Editor' WHEN 'conference_proceeding' THEN 'Editor' ELSE 'Author' END as person_role_en, CASE pt.code WHEN 'publication_edited-book' THEN 'Redaktör' WHEN 'publication_textcritical-edition' THEN 'Redaktör' WHEN 'publication_journal-issue' THEN 'Redaktör' WHEN 'conference_proceeding' THEN 'Redaktör' ELSE 'Författare' END as person_role_sv FROM people p JOIN people2publications p2p ON p2p.person_id = p.id LEFT JOIN identifiers i ON p.id = i.person_id AND i.source_id = (SELECT id FROM sources WHERE name = 'xkonto'::text) JOIN publication_versions pv ON pv.id = p2p.publication_version_id JOIN publication_types pt ON pt.id = pv.publication_type_id WHERE p2p.publication_version_id = '${publication.id}' ORDER BY p2p.position

entity.name: departments
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.id AS department_id, d.name_sv, d.name_en, d.palassoid, CASE d.is_internal WHEN true THEN 2 WHEN false THEN 0 END as instance_id FROM departments d JOIN departments2people2publications d2p2p ON d2p2p.department_id = d.id JOIN people2publications p2p ON p2p.id = d2p2p.people2publication_id WHERE p2p.publication_version_id = '${publication.id}'

entity.name: categories
entity.query: SELECT c.id AS category_id, c.name_sv, c.name_en, c.svepid FROM categories c JOIN categories2publications c2p ON c2p.category_id = c.id WHERE c2p.publication_version_id = '${publication.id}' AND c.category_type = 'HSV_LOCAL_12'

entity.name: series
entity.query: SELECT s.id AS serie_id, s.title as seriestitle, s2p.serie_part as seriespart FROM series s JOIN series2publications s2p ON s2p.serie_id = s.id WHERE s2p.publication_version_id = '${publication.id}'

entity.name: files
entity.query: SELECT '1' AS attrib, url FROM publication_links WHERE publication_version_id = '${publication.id}' UNION SELECT '3' as attrib, 'https://gup.ub.gu.se/file/' || ad.id AS url FROM asset_data ad JOIN publications p on p.id = ad.publication_id WHERE p.current_version_id = '${publication.id}' AND ad.deleted_at IS NULL AND ad.accepted IS NOT NULL AND (ad.visible_after is null OR ad.visible_after < (SELECT now()::timestamp))
